text: Hey all! I am looking in to the possibility of integrating our Shopify webshop with HubSpot to use HubSpots abandoned cart module to send e-mails when users in our webshop have left products in their cart. I already found out to use this module we need a Marketing Hub or Sales Hub Professional subscription. But before I subscribe to those, I want to know if this module/integration is technically possible when the frontend setup of our webshop is headless. I was wondering if any of you would happen to know this?
